Overview.FormattedContent:
Generate an inspiration

Instructions

Below we present a problem:

$problem or $schema

Find an inspiration in Google that can help us solve the problem. Good inspirations include methods, technologies, knowledge which can potentially inspire creative solutions.

QuestionContent.Text: 1. Please copy and paste the webpage link of the inspiration to the text box below.

2. If the website you found contains an image of the inspiration, please copy the image link and paste it to the text box below.To copy image link, right click the image and: - In Google Chrome, select "Copy Image URL." - In Safari, select "Copy Image Address." - In Internet Explorer, select "Properties." Then, highlight the address under "Address (URL)" and copy (Ctrl+C). - In Mozilla Firefox, select "Copy Image Location."
3. Please summarize the inspiration in a few sentences.
4. Why do you think the inspiration you found might help with solving the problem?
